dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3474311U] Abuse report for Domain registered within your services
dmca.body:
The disputed material in the below-pasted e-mail is the domain name, not the content of the website. As an ISP, we are compelled by Federal Law to disable access of website if it infringes copyright or trademark rights of third parties. This is not the case since the website www.usssportscamps.com neither uses the Trademark US Sports Camps on his website nor has US Sports Camps content display there. As the disputed material is the domain name and it is not under our control, because it was not registered with us. This issue should be resolved either by the registrar of the domain name usssportscamps.com or ICANN. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 13, 2007 9:45 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3474311U] Abuse report for Domain registered within your services ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse report for Domain registered within your services Added by system at Tuesday, Mar 13 2007 02:50 pm X-MailFrom: SWeinberg@ussportscamps.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; 13 Mar 2007 19:50:17 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 13 Mar 2007 14:50:17 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 13 Mar 2007 13:50:16 -0600 (CST) Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C765A8.C872DF36" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Abuse report for Domain registered within your services Subject: Abuse report for Domain registered within your services Date: Tue, 13 Mar 2007 12:49:56 -0700 Message-ID: <7A670AEE31F24247A11E98A877C9016D0234A440@lance.ussports.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Abuse report for Domain registered within your services Thread-Index: Acdlmod1RvgTsWQ7QHuhpEbwvYmjBgADiUPg From: "Stephen Weinberg" To: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: SWeinberg@ussportscamps.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Mar 2007 19:50:16.0909 (UTC) FILETIME=[D2CFBFD0:01C765A8] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Greetings... My Client, US Sports Camps, Inc. has discovered a web site which is attempting to "Spoof" visitors who have miss-typed its URL to be hosted through your services. The site, http://www.usssportscamps.com resolves the following DNS and NAMESERVER information through the WHOIS database OrgName: Everyones Internet OrgID: EVRY Address: 390 Benmar Address: Suite 200 City: Houston StateProv: TX PostalCode: 77060 Country: US ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.ev1servers.net:4321/ NetRange: 209.85.0.0 - 209.85.127.255 CIDR: 209.85.0.0/17 NetName: EVRY-BLK-15 NetHandle: NET-209-85-0-0-1 Parent: NET-209-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.EV1SERVERS.NET NameServer: NS2.EV1SERVERS.NET Comment: RegDate: 2005-12-14 Updated: 2006-11-28 If this site is not hosted through your organization, please accept our apologies for contacting you in such a manner. If however this site is in some way affiliated with your company, we respectfully request that you disable, deactivate and otherwise eliminate the site from your hosting platform as its domain is infringing on a Federally Copyrighted domain name and Company trademark. The Company, US Sports Camps, Inc. can and will enforce this trademark through legal action at their discretion if this matter is not resolved promptly. Your attention to this matter is greatly appreciated. Stephen Weinberg VP, CTO US Sports Camps, Inc. 415/451-2221 sweinberg@ussportscamps.com MIME element (text/html)

 

Greetings…

 

My Client, US Sports Camps, Inc. has discovered a web site which is attempting to “Spoof” visitors who have  miss-typed its URL to be hosted through your services.

 

The site, http://www.usssportscamps.com resolves the following DNS and NAMESERVER information through the WHOIS database

 

OrgName:  Everyones Internet
OrgID:   EVRY
Address:  390 Benmar
Address:  Suite 200
City:    Houston
StateProv: TX
PostalCode: 77060
Country:  US

ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.ev1servers.net:4321/

NetRange:  209.85.0.0 - 209.85.127.255
CIDR:    209.85.0.0/17
NetName:  EVRY-BLK-15
NetHandle: NET-209-85-0-0-1
Parent:   NET-209-0-0-0-0
NetType:  Direct Allocation
NameServer: NS1.EV1SERVERS.NET
NameServer: NS2.EV1SERVERS.NET
Comment:
RegDate:  2005-12-14
Updated:  2006-11-28

 

If this site is not hosted through your organization, please accept our apologies for contacting you in such a manner.

 

If however this site is in some way affiliated with your company, we respectfully request that you disable, deactivate and otherwise eliminate the site from your hosting platform as its domain is infringing on a Federally Copyrighted domain name and Company trademark.

 

The Company, US Sports Camps, Inc. can and will enforce this trademark through legal action at their discretion if this matter is not resolved promptly.

 

Your attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

 

 

Stephen Weinberg

VP, CTO

US Sports Camps, Inc.

415/451-2221

sweinberg@ussportscamps.com

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
